verbs.description: skittles [V: will] come out with candy that tastes like rotten zombie for halloween there will be a new skittles flavor released next halloween and it supposed to taste like rotten zombie each zombie skittles pack will have the traditional fruit - flavored candies but with a few random pieces of the zombie flavor dispersed throughout harry potter skittles halloween candy mars bertie bott
